title: The unpublished preface to Orwell’s Animal Farm
dot: digraph AnimalFarm{node[shape=box, style=rounded, fontname="Helvetica", fontsize=10];Orwell[label="George Orwell (Eric Blair)", shape=ellipse, style=filled, fillcolor=lightyellow];AnimalFarm[label="Animal Farm (1945)", shape=box, style=filled, fillcolor=lightblue];PoliticalFable[label="Political Fable", shape=box, style=dashed];Satire[label="Soviet Satire\n(Transition to Totalitarianism)", shape=box, style=dotted];Censorship[label="Censorship of Orwell's Work", shape=box];Intellectuals[label="Intellectuals & Groupthink", shape=box];Stalin[label="Joseph Stalin", shape=ellipse, style=filled, fillcolor=lightgreen];USSR[label="Soviet Union", shape=box, style=filled, fillcolor=lightgreen];Preface[label="Preface: The Freedom of the Press", shape=box, style=filled, fillcolor=lightgrey];SelfCensorship[label="Self-Censorship and Intellectual Cowardice", shape=box];PublishingDifficulties[label="Difficulty in Publication", shape=box];Orwell->AnimalFarm[label="Authored"];AnimalFarm->PoliticalFable[label="Genre"];AnimalFarm->Satire[label="Represents"];Satire->Stalin[label="Allusions"];Satire->USSR[label="Soviet Union Transition"];Orwell->Censorship[label="Faced"];Orwell->Intellectuals[label="Critiques"];Censorship->Intellectuals[label="Groupthink against criticism"];Intellectuals->SelfCensorship[label="Protect Prestige"];Preface->PublishingDifficulties[label="Orwell’s struggle"];Orwell->Preface[label="Introduced in 1971"];Orwell->SelfCensorship[label="Critical of"];summary[label="Orwell's defense of free speech\nagainst censorship and intellectual cowardice", shape=plaintext, fontcolor=darkgrey];rankdir=LR;}
